title: Naturopathic Medicine
cleaned_text: What is Naturopathic Medicine? Naturopathic physicians concentrate on whole-patient wellness and recognize that individual symptoms serve as guides to finding the underlying cause of disease. Unlike western medical doctors, Naturopathic Doctors are not looking to mask symptoms of underlying issues by using prescription medicines. Rather, naturopathic and functional medicine doctors utilize natural therapeutic methods to encourage reductions in symptoms, naturally, by optimizing the health in the individual. Our Method We use various tools to support patients on their health journeys, including: - Traditional Chinese Medicine - Functional Medicine - Applied Kinesiology - Botanical Medicine - Homeopathy - Nutritional Therapies Our practitioner To learn more about Dr. Izold, you can read her bio [here](https://www.acuatlanta.com/our-practitioners/#drizold). Our pricing For a limited time - Free 30 minute initial consultations. You can book online, or call. Initial Session: $250-$450 depending on the severity of your condition. Call us for more info. Follow up session: 15 minute follow-up $70
